Key Match Events: Daniel Munoz and Jefferson Lerma scored headers in the first half, both assisted by James Rodriguez.
Julio Enciso scored for Paraguay in the 69th minute, but it was too late to turn the game around.
Post-Match Reflections: James Rodriguez had a dominant performance with two magnificent assists.
Miguel Almiron struggled and was substituted after 59 minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia have not lost a match at the international level in more than two years.
Colombia will face Costa Rica on June 28 and Brazil on July 2.
